item.title: 全球经济图表：美国和中国的预测因关税停战而改善
item.description: 在美国和中国这两个世界上最大的经济体达成降低彼此关税的临时协议后，经济学家们上调了对两国经济增长的预测。【原文：Economists marked up their forecasts for growth in the US and China after the world’s two-largest economies reached a temporary agreement to reduce tariffs on each other.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔称利率需要 "稳健之手
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）认为，欧洲中央银行在利率举措上应保持谨慎。【原文：The European Central Bank should remain caution on interest-rate moves, according to Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官认为没有证据表明人工智能芯片流入中国
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）表示对公司的贸易伙伴充满信心，并称没有证据表明其珍贵的半导体产品被转移到中国市场。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang expressed confidence in his company’s trade partners and said there’s no evidence of its prized semiconductors being diverted to the Chinese market.】

item.title: 英国央行预测调整可能引发市场混乱
item.description: 前英格兰银行利率制定者警告说，央行计划对其预测和沟通策略进行调整，这有可能给金融市场带来混乱，并削弱决策者之间的辩论。【原文：Former Bank of England ratesetters are warning that a planned shake-up of the central bank’s forecast and communications strategy risks sowing confusion in financial markets and weakening debate among policymakers.】

item.title: 韩国锦湖轮胎光州工厂火灾导致停产
item.description: 据韩联社报道，周六上午 7:11 左右，锦湖轮胎位于光州的工厂发生火灾，公司被迫停止生产。【原文：A fire broke out at Kumho Tire’s plant in Gwangju at around 7:11am Saturday, forcing the company to halt production, according to Yonhap News Agency.】

item.title: 土耳其雪莱比公司称在印度撤销许可后将与印度合作
item.description: 土耳其公司 Çelebi Aviation 周六表示，在地勤和货物仓库业务因国家安全问题被暂停后，该公司正与印度当局 "充分合作"，并遵守相关规定。【原文：Turkish company Çelebi Aviation said on Saturday it’s “fully cooperating” with Indian authorities and adhering to regulations after its ground handling and cargo warehouse operations were suspended due to national security concerns.】

item.title: AirTrunk 亿万富翁在悉尼皇冠买下第二处房产：SMH
item.description: 据《悉尼先驱晨报》（Sydney Morning Herald）周六报道，澳大利亚数据中心运营商 AirTrunk 的创始人兼首席执行官罗宾-胡达（Robin Khuda）和妻子梅莱娅（Melea）在悉尼皇冠塔（Crown Towers）购买了第二处房产，价格约为 2000 万澳元（1280 万美元）。【原文：Founder and chief executive of Australian data center operator AirTrunk Robin Khuda and his wife Melea bought a second property in Sydney’s Crown Towers for roughly A$20 million ($12.8 million), the Sydney Morning Herald reported Saturday.】

item.title: 印度公司和消费者蔑视巴基斯坦及其盟友
item.description: 南亚邻国之间的冲突加剧后，越来越多的印度商人、公司和消费者正在切断与巴基斯坦及其一些盟国的商业联系。【原文：A growing number of Indian merchants, companies, and consumers are cutting business ties with Pakistan and some of its allies after a heightened conflict between the South Asian neighbors.】

item.title: 卢特尼克建立的 FMX 将开始国债期货交易，打击 CME
item.description: 由美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）创办的一家交易所将于下周开始人们期待已久的美国国债期货交易，这对主导该市场的芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group Inc.【原文：An exchange founded by Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick is set to start the long-awaited trading of US Treasury futures next week in a blow to CME Group Inc., which dominates that market.】

item.title: 特斯拉在马斯克薪酬事件后采取行动阻止股东诉讼
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）采取了一项措施，以防止未来出现类似阻碍首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）创纪录薪酬方案的股东诉讼。【原文：Tesla Inc. took a step to prevent future shareholder lawsuits like the one that blocked a record-setting pay package for Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk.】

item.description: 旅行者科技公司（Voyager Technologies Inc.【原文：Voyager Technologies Inc. filed publicly for an initial public offering, as it seeks to capitalize on rising government spending on advanced defense technologies and space exploration.】

item.title: 巴蒂斯塔兄弟退出 Banco Master 资产谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，通过家族控股公司 J&F Investimentos SA 控制肉类巨头 JBS SA 的乔斯利-巴蒂斯塔（Joesley Batista）和韦斯利-巴蒂斯塔（Wesley Batista）兄弟俩已不再洽谈收购 Banco Master 的部分资产，因为人们对该银行的财务稳定性一直存在担忧。【原文：Joesley and Wesley Batista, the brothers who control meat giant JBS SA through their family holding J&F Investimentos SA, are no longer in talks to acquire some of Banco Master’s assets amid lingering concerns over the lender’s financial stability, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师对穆迪下调美国信用评级的反应
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）以政府债务增加和利息负担加重为由下调了美国的信用评级，随后美国股市下跌，国债收益率上升。【原文：US stocks declined and Treasury yields rose after Moody’s Ratings downgraded the US credit rating, citing an increase in government debt and a higher interest burden.】

item.title: 亚洲货币在近期反弹后可能会走上不同的道路
item.description: 亚洲货币在兑美元汇率集体反弹后将走上不同的道路，因为投资者要应对贸易不确定性和对世界前两大经济体增长的担忧。【原文：Asian currencies are set to take divergent paths after a collective rally against the dollar, as investors navigate trade uncertainty and growth concerns about the world’s top two economies.】

item.title: 穆迪因政府债务增加下调美国信用评级
item.description: 由于政府债务增加，穆迪评级公司下调了美国的评级，这一具有里程碑意义的举措使人们对美国作为世界上最优质主权借款国的地位产生了怀疑。【原文：The US was downgraded by Moody’s Ratings on an increase in government debt, a landmark move that casts doubt on the nation’s status as the world’s highest-quality sovereign borrower.】

item.title: 萨克斯债权人在潜在债务谈判前组成多数集团
item.description: 据知情人士透露，持有萨克斯全球企业 2029 年到期的 22 亿美元债券一半以上的债权人已经组织起来，准备与该公司就其融资方案进行谈判。【原文：Saks Global Enterprises creditors that hold more than half of its $2.2 billion bond due 2029 have organized and are preparing for potential talks with the company regarding its financing options, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 饱受打击的华尔街空头大军拒绝认输
item.description: 就这样，华尔街的恐慌几乎在来临的同时迅速消失了。【原文：Just like that, the panic on Wall Street has vanished almost as quickly as it arrived.】

item.title: 关税迫在眉睫，前景黯淡成为焦点：盈利观察
item.description: 随着第一季度财报季接近尾声，有一件事已经很清楚了：即使在贸易紧张局势出现缓和迹象，股市大涨的情况下，全球经济的不确定前景也正在取代好于预期的业绩。【原文：One thing is clear as the first-quarter earnings season draws to a close: The uncertain outlook for the global economy is superseding better-than-feared results even as stocks rally on signs of easing trade tensions.】

item.title: 据说 Binance 和 Kraken 已成为黑客攻击的目标
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士称，Binance 和 Kraken 是主要加密货币交易所之一，它们已成为同类社交工程黑客攻击的目标，Coinbase Global Inc.【原文：Binance and Kraken are among major crypto exchanges that have been targeted by the same type of social-engineering hack that was recently disclosed by Coinbase Global Inc., according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 中国国债持有量跌至第三，落后于英国
item.description: 中国在 3 月份缩减了美国国债的持有量，英国取代中国成为第二大海外持有国。【原文：China shrank its holdings of US Treasuries in March, with the UK replacing it as the No. 2 overseas owner.】

item.title: 对冲基金因中美贸易停战看涨布伦特原油
item.description: 随着世界两大经济体缓和贸易紧张局势，对冲基金将布伦特原油的看涨押注推高至五周以来的最高点。【原文：Hedge funds boosted bullish bets in Brent crude to the highest in five weeks as the world’s two biggest economies ratcheted down trade tensions.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁提供资金，芝加哥选择 EY 弥补 10 亿美元缺口
item.description: 芝加哥正在聘请安永会计师事务所（Ernst & Young LLP）帮助该市削减成本，弥补预计未来两年每年将高达 10 亿美元的预算缺口。【原文：Chicago is hiring Ernst & Young LLP to help the city slash costs and close budget gaps that are forecast to top $1 billion in each of the next two years.】

item.title: 未触及的小额贷款税收优惠缓解了充斥市场的冲动
item.description: 本周，税收法案草案没有取消最重要的免税政策，市政债券投资者可能因此而感到宽慰，但对于寻求现金的州政府和地方政府来说，这一喘息机会可能会冷却今年的市场。【原文：Municipal bond investors likely felt relief this week when a draft tax bill didn’t erase the all-important tax exemption, but that respite may cool this year’s market for state and local governments seeking cash.】

item.title: 特朗普的加密项目回击参议院小组调查
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的 "世界自由金融"（World Liberty Financial）加密货币项目的律师回击了参议院调查小组委员会民主党负责人提出的关于潜在利益冲突的指控。【原文：Attorneys for Donald Trump’s World Liberty Financial crypto project pushed back against claims about potential conflicts of interest raised by the Democratic head of a Senate investigative subcommittee.】

item.title: 关税影响盈利，Globant 日内跌幅创历史新高
item.description: 软件公司 Globant SA 将令人失望的第一季度业绩归咎于美国关税的连锁反应，盘中跌幅创下历史新高。【原文：Software company Globant SA suffered a record intraday decline after blaming its disappointing first-quarter results on the ripple effects of US tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普领导的美国证券交易委员会对首席执行官薪酬披露进行新一轮审查
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会将于下月召开圆桌会议，讨论高管薪酬披露规则，委员会主席保罗-阿特金斯（Paul Atkins）表示，这些规则已变得 "日益复杂和冗长"。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission will hold a roundtable next month to discuss executive compensation disclosure rules, which Chair Paul Atkins said have grown “increasingly complex and lengthy.”】

item.title: OpenAI 将帮助阿联酋开发世界上最大的数据中心之一
item.description: OpenAI 计划帮助在阿拉伯联合酋长国开发一个新的大型数据中心，该中心最终可能成为世界上最大的数据中心之一，这是对中东地区的一次重大投资，也是该公司全球人工智能基础设施雄心的一次重大扩展。【原文：OpenAI plans to help develop a massive new data center in the United Arab Emirates that may eventually be one of the largest in the world, a major bet on the Middle East and a significant expansion of the company’s global AI infrastructure ambitions.】

item.title: Cinven 为 60 亿欧元的 Ufinet 出售案与高盛和瑞银合作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权公司 Cinven 已选择高盛集团和瑞银集团安排电信运营商 Ufinet 集团的出售事宜。【原文：Private equity firm Cinven has selected Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and UBS Group AG to arrange a sale of telecom operator Ufinet Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Marfrig 业绩飙升，BRF 收购计划被认为有利于买方
item.description: Marfrig Global Foods SA 对 BRF SA 提出收购要约后，公司业绩创下五年来最大涨幅，收购条件被分析师视为低廉，收购后公司规模将更大，可与世界顶级食品供应商相抗衡。【原文：Marfrig Global Foods SA surged the most in five years after making a takeover offer for BRF SA, creating a larger company to rival the world’s top food suppliers under terms that analysts saw as a bargain.】
